name: Retail Banking
description: Consumer-focused services including checking, savings, and personal loans for individuals and small businesses.

name: Corporate Banking
description: Specialized financial services for large corporations, including complex lending, cash management, and trade finance.

name: Investment Banking
description: Advisory services for mergers, acquisitions, and capital raising activities for institutional clients.

name: Asset Management
description: Professional management of various securities and assets to meet specified investment goals for clients.

name: Wealth Management
description: Comprehensive financial planning and investment services for high-net-worth individuals and families.

name: Insurance Services
description: Provision of various insurance products and risk management solutions within the banking ecosystem.

name: Payment Systems
description: Infrastructure and services facilitating electronic funds transfers and digital transactions.

name: Treasury Services
description: Management of an organization's liquidity, funding, and financial risk.

name: Mortgage Banking
description: Origination, servicing, and securitization of home loans and other real estate financing products.

name: Capital Markets
description: Facilitation of trading in financial instruments and provision of market-making services.

name: Credit Services
description: Evaluation and extension of credit to individuals and businesses, including credit cards and lines of credit.

name: Fintech Solutions
description: Innovative technology-driven financial services enhancing traditional banking offerings and operations.
